flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: When hunting, itnskims the surfacenof water at highfspeed to pick offnunwary prey suchnas MAGIKARP.
When hunting, itnskims the surfacenof water at highfspeed to pick offnunwary prey suchnas MAGIKARP.
This POKéMON fliesnat Mach 2 speed,nseeking prey.fIts large talonsnare feared asnwicked weapons.
Its well-developednchest muscles makenit strong enoughfto whip up a gustynwindstorm withnjust a few flaps.
It spreads itsnbeautiful wingsnwide to frightenfits enemies. Itncan fly at Mach 2nspeed.
Its outstandingnvision allows itnto spot splashingfMAGIKARP, evennwhile flying atn3300 feet.

This POKéMON has a dazzling plumage ofnbeautifully glossy feathers.nMany TRAINERS are captivated by thefstriking beauty of the feathers on itsnhead, compelling them to choose PIDGEOTnas their POKéMON.

This POKéMON has a dazzling plumage ofnbeautifully glossy feathers.nMany TRAINERS are captivated by thefstriking beauty of the feathers on itsnhead, compelling them to choose PIDGEOTnas their POKéMON.
This POKéMON has gorgeous, glossynfeathers. Many TRAINERS are so captivatednby the beautiful feathers on its head thatnthey choose PIDGEOT as their POKéMON.
It spreads its gorgeous wings widely tonintimidate enemies. It races through thenskies at Mach-2 speed.
When hunting, it skims the surface ofnwater at high speed to pick off unwarynprey such as MAGIKARP.
By flapping its wings with all itsnmight, PIDGEOT can make a gust ofnwind capable of bending tall trees.
By flapping its wings with all itsnmight, PIDGEOT can make a gust ofnwind capable of bending tall trees.
By flapping its wings with all itsnmight, PIDGEOT can make a gust ofnwind capable of bending tall trees.
Its well-developed chest muscles makenit strong enough to whip up a gustynwindstorm with just a few flaps.
It spreads its beautiful wingsnwide to frighten its enemies. Itncan fly at Mach 2 speed.
En battant des ailes de toutes sesnforces, Roucarnage génère unenrafale à en déraciner les arbres.
By flapping its wings with all itsnmight, Pidgeot can make a gust ofnwind capable of bending tall trees.
En battant des ailes de toutes sesnforces, Roucarnage génère unenrafale à en déraciner les arbres.
By flapping its wings with all itsnmight, Pidgeot can make a gust ofnwind capable of bending tall trees.
By flapping its wings with all itsnmight, Pidgeot can make a gust ofnwind capable of bending tall trees.
By flapping its wings with all itsnmight, Pidgeot can make a gust ofnwind capable of bending tall trees.
エサを　さがすとき　すいめんnすれすれを　すべるように　とんでnコイキングなどを　わしづかみにする。
먹이를 찾을 때 수면을n아슬아슬하게 미끄러지듯 날아n잉어킹 등을 움켜잡는다.
Il survole la surface de l’eau pour repérer une proienet plonge en piqué pour l’attraper.
Dieses Pokémon schnellt bei der Jagd blitzschnellnunter Wasser, um seine ahnungslose Beute zu fangen.
Cuando caza, vuela muy deprisa a ras del agua ynsorprende a inocentes presas como Magikarp.
Quando caccia, vola velocissimo sul pelo dell’acquane cattura ignare prede come Magikarp.
When hunting, it skims the surface of waternat high speed to pick off unwary prey suchnas Magikarp.
エサを　探すとき　水面　すれすれをn滑るように　飛んでnコイキングなどを　わしづかみにする。
うつくしい　ハネを　ひろげてnあいてを　いかくする。nマッハ２で　そらを　とびまわる。
아름다운 날개를 펼쳐n상대를 위협한다.n마하2로 하늘을 날아다닌다.
Roucarnage déploie ses ailes majestueuses pourneffrayer ses ennemis. Il peut voler à Mach 2.
Es breitet seine betörenden Schwingen aus,num den Gegner einzuschüchtern.nSeine Fluggeschwindigkeit liegt bei Mach 2.
Para intimidar a su enemigo, extiende las increíblesnalas que tiene. Este Pokémon vuela a una velocidadnincreíble.
Intimidisce i nemici spiegando le possenti ali.nIn volo raggiunge la velocità di Mach 2.
It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to intimidatenenemies. It races through the skies atnMach-2 speed.
美しい　羽を　広げてn相手を　威嚇する。nマッハ２で　空を　飛び回る。
うつくしい　こうたくの　はねを　もつ　ポケモン。nあたまの　はねの　うつくしさに　こころ　うばわれnピジョットを　そだてる　トレーナーも　おおい。
아름답게 윤이 나는 깃털을 가진 포켓몬이다.n머리 깃털의 아름다움에 마음을 빼앗겨n피죤투를 기르는 트레이너도 많다.
Ce Pokémon est doté d’un plumage magnifique et luisant.nBien des Dresseurs sont captivés par la beauté fatale densa huppe et décident de choisir Roucarnage comme leurnPokémon favori.
Dieses Pokémon hat ein wunderschönes, glänzendesnGefieder. Viele Trainer sind von der auffälligen Schönheitnseines Federkleids begeistert, sodass sie Tauboss als ihrnPokémon wählen.

El plumaje de este Pokémon es bonito e hipnótico.nMuchos Entrenadores se quedan embobados ante la bellezanimpactante de las plumas que tiene en la cabeza; lo que lesnlleva a elegir a Pidgeot como su Pokémon.

Questo Pokémon è caratterizzato da uno stupendo piumaggiondai colori vivaci e brillanti. Molti Allenatori sono colpitindall’evidente bellezza delle piume sulla testa. Per questonspesso scelgono Pidgeot come loro Pokémon.

This Pokémon has a dazzling plumage of beautifullynglossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by thenstriking beauty of the feathers on its head, compellingnthem to choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.
美しい　光沢の　羽を　持つ　ポケモン。n頭の　羽の　美しさに　心　奪われnピジョットを　育てる　トレーナーも　多い。
うつくしい　こうたくの　はねを　もつ　ポケモン。nあたまの　はねの　うつくしさに　こころ　うばわれnピジョットを　そだてる　トレーナーも　おおい。

This Pokémon has a dazzling plumage of beautifullynglossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by thenstriking beauty of the feathers on its head, compellingnthem to choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.
美しい　光沢の　羽を　持つ　ポケモン。n頭の　羽の　美しさに　心　奪われnピジョットを　育てる　トレーナーも　多い。
きんりょくが　おおはばに　アップ。n２しゅうかんの　あいだ　やすまずnとびつづけることが　できるのだ。
マッハ２で　ひこうし　エサをさがす。nその　おおきな　ツメは　ぶきとnしても　おそれられている。
근력이 대폭 상승했다.n2주 동안 쉬지 않고n계속 날 수 있다.
마하2의 속도로 비행하여 먹이를 찾는다.n그 커다란 발톱은 무기로서도n두려움의 대상이다.
會以２馬赫的速度飛行n來尋找食物。巨大的爪子n是很可怕的武器。
肌肉的力量大幅提昇，n能夠連續２個星期n不眠不休地飛行。
Ce Pokémon vole à Mach 2 quand il chasse.nSes grandes serres sont des armes redoutables.
Ses muscles se sont tant développés qu’il estndésormais capable de voler pendant deuxnsemaines sans se reposer.
Auf der Jagd nach Beute fliegt es mit einernGeschwindigkeit von bis zu Mach 2. Seinenmächtigen Klauen gelten als gefürchtete Waffen.
Durch seine gesteigerte Körperkraft ist es in dernLage, zwei Wochen ohne Pause durchzufliegen.
Este Pokémon vuela a una velocidad de 2 machnen busca de presas. Sus grandes garras son armasnmuy peligrosas.
Su potencia muscular ha aumentado tanto quenes capaz de mantener el vuelo sin descansondurante dos semanas.
La sua forza muscolare aumenta notevolmente,npermettendogli di volare senza sosta per duensettimane consecutive.
Può volare a una velocità di Mach 2 in cercandi prede. I suoi artigli sono armi micidiali.
This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed,nseeking prey. Its large talons are fearednas wicked weapons.
With its muscular strength now greatlynincreased, it can fly continuously for two weeksnwithout resting.
マッハ２で　飛行し　エサを探す。nその　大きな　ツメは　武器とnしても　恐れられている。
筋力が　大幅に　アップ。n２週間の　あいだ　休まずn飛び続けることが　できるのだ。
以２马赫的飞行速度来n觅食。它巨大的爪子是n非常令人惧怕的武器。
肌肉的力量大幅提升。n能够连续２个星期n不眠不休地持续飞行。
